channel.title: Error when fighting dummies
channel.description:
I get kicked from my own server and get this error message in my console: Error: T2 - 164,134,134 - 2,3250,3435 - 91,47,
I am useing moparscape client with cheezcape server. Can anyone help me?

item.title: Error when fighting dummies
item.dc:creator: @octavius octavius
item.description:
@octavius wrote:

It has a default or something and it switches it back. :S[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2008, 11:55:35 PM[/size][hr]How do I figure out how high the max skill levels are on this server client base code?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2008, 11:56:30 PM[/size][hr]nm found it! :][br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 29, 2008, 12:13:10 AM[/size][hr]How do I edit a dat file?

Read full topic

item.title: Error when fighting dummies

item.description:
@octavius wrote:

Im going to turn it off for now… I am the server owner and trying to get my toon up before I allow people on. :]

Am I on the right track though?

item.title: Error when fighting dummies

item.description:
@hippie wrote:

That’s your anti mass to stop rapid clicking.

Read full topic

item.title: Error when fighting dummies
item.dc:creator: @octavius octavius
item.description:
@octavius wrote:

Fixed it, now it says my client acts too fast? Any way to fix this problem?
What I did was deleted the following code in the addxp code strings.
actionTimer = 12;[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2008, 10:32:48 PM[/size][hr]Found a script that says:

	if (actionAmount > 4) {
		sendMessage("Kicked for acting too fast!");
		misc.println("Client acts too fast - disconnecting it");
		disconnected = true;
	}

Maybe deleting that would clear the booting?

Read full topic

item.description:
@barkingdogc wrote:

here find the object id in the client.java and post it up here it most likly is a grafics issue as openice said try and look at it first and if you still cant figure it out post it up here and i’ll take a look.
